attributes.action: Introduce a law that requires all dogs to be on a lead in a public space.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to seriously consider the positive impact that introducing a law like this would have for the safety of dogs, owners and the wider public.
attributes.background: There has been a significant increase in dog attacks in recent years. I believe that keeping all dogs on a lead in a public space should help reduce the amount of attacks, and keep the public safe.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Make it compulsory for all dogs to be on leads on public land.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650650
